name: The 7th International Congress on Natural Sciences and Engineering
content: Organized by Higher Education Forum (HEF), The 7th International Conference on Natural Sciences and Engineering(ICNSE) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of Natural Sciences and Engineering and more. 2018 ICNSE will take place from April 12-14, 2018 ,in Kuala Lumpur Malaysia. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals. For more information, please visit: http://www.icnse.org or contact: icnse@icnse.org
